resources.string: Text recognition will only work with camera permission
Permission is needed to start the camera for data recognition

Mobile Application Privacy Policy


This privacy policy describes how this mobile application (\"App\") collects, uses, and shares information about you when you use our App.

Information We Collect

We may collect the following types of information:

  • Information You Provide Directly:
    • This may include information you provide when you create an account, fill out forms, or contact us for support. Examples include:
      • Username or display name
      • Email address (if applicable)
      • Any other information you choose to provide.
  • Information We Collect Automatically:
    • We may automatically collect certain information about your use of the App, including:
      • Device Information: Information about your mobile device, such as the device type, operating system, unique device identifiers, and mobile network information.
      • Usage Information: Information about how you use the App, such as the features you use, the time and duration of your use, and other usage statistics.
      • Log Data: Information about your interactions with the App, such as IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
      • Location Information: (If applicable) If you grant the App permission to access your location, we may collect information about your device\'s location.
  • Information from Third Parties:
    • We may receive information about you from third-party services if you connect your account to those services. (examples: advertisement networks, analytics providers)

How We Use Your Information

We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:

  • To provide and maintain the App.
  • To improve the App and develop new features.
  • To personalize your experience.
  • To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and providing support.
  • To analyze usage trends and patterns.
  • To display advertisements, when applicable.
  • To ensure the security and integrity of the app.
  • To comply with applicable laws and regulations.

Sharing Your Information

We may share your information with:

  • Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in providing and maintaining the App (e.g., hosting providers, analytics providers).
  • Advertising Partners: We may share information with advertising partners to display targeted advertisements within the app.
  • Legal Compliance: We may share your information if required by law or in response to a valid legal request.
  • Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or other business transfer, we may share your information with the acquiring entity.
  • With your consent: We may share your information with third parties when we have your consent to do so.

Your Choices

  • You may be able to control certain data collection and usage settings within the App or your device settings.
  • You may be able to uninstall the App at any time.
  • If the app collects location data, you can typically disable location services in your device settings.
  • Regarding advertising, you may be able to limit ad tracking in your device settings.

Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is completely secure.

Children\'s Privacy

This App is not intended for use by children under the age of [insert age, e.g., 13]. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under that age. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under that age, we will take steps to delete it.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new privacy policy within the App or by other means. Your continued use of the App after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new privacy policy.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the app\'s support section or via the contact information provided within the app\'s store listing.
